description: the current being drawn by the chiller.
the difference in temperature between the chilled water supply and return temperatures.
the current being drawn by the compressor.
the temperature of the liquid refrigerant in the condenser.
the flow rate of the water in the condenser.

meter: condenser water return to tower temperature
description: the temperature of the water returning to the condenser water tower.

meter: condenser water supply to chiller temperature
description: the temperature of the water being supplied to the condenser.
the flow rate of the coolant in the chiller.
the setpoint for the pressure difference across the coolant circuit.
the temperature of the liquid refrigerant in the evaporator.
the operating mode of the chiller (e.g. cooling  standby).
a flag indicating whether makeup water is being added to the chiller.
the pressure of the coolant returning to the chiller.
the temperature of the coolant returning to the chiller.
the pressure of the coolant being supplied to the chiller.
indicates the percentage of the chiller's maximum capacity that is being used.
measures the efficiency of the chiller in converting electrical energy into cooling capacity.
a reference value for the maximum efficiency that the chiller can achieve.
measures the temperature difference between the refrigerant and the cooling water at the condenser outlet.
formula: Condenser Water Supply To Chiller Temperature (F) - Condenser Liquid Refrigerant Temperature (F)

description: measures the electrical power consumed by the chiller.
measures the cooling capacity of the chiller in tons.
formula: Coolant Flow (GPM) x Specific Heat of Coolant (BTU/lb-F) x Chilled Water Delta T (F) / 12

description: indicates the speed of the chiller's variable frequency drive (vfd) as a percentage of its maximum speed.
formula: (Actual VFD Speed / Maximum VFD Speed) x 100
